title: longsleeves
description: Highest quality cut and sew longsleeve T-Shirt with own developed pattern featuring dropped shoulders with wide chest and cropped length to achieve a fashion forward look t-shirt with an oversized fit that doesn’t feel baggy but boxy. Premium double stitched cuffs on the sleeves. Our most premium fabric offering, milled with finely knitted heavyweight combed organic cotton. Manufactured in Spain
